FullDialogue.speaker: Kitty
FullDialogue.conversation: I am here. I have the costume and my tickets. I am so in the mood for fun.

FullDialogue.speaker: Amber
FullDialogue.conversation: Wow, Kitty, you look so hot. You will be a delish dish at the party!

FullDialogue.speaker: Kitty
FullDialogue.conversation: I can't wait to get this party started!

FullDialogue.speaker: Amber
FullDialogue.conversation: And we are off!...You enjoy these snaps from past parties!
